title: Multimodal Teaching Method Application Program to Enhance Nursing Learning Confidence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Theoretical Foundations of Nursing and Clinical Practice Knowledge
context.additional_context: Need for supporting asynchronous collaborative learning and self-directed learning in smartphone-based LMS environments

learning_goals: Learners improve their clinical situational comprehension by 80% or more through patient case analysis using the jigsaw technique.
Learners achieve 75% or higher in their ability to explain the interconnectedness of nursing theories through concept mapping activities.
Learners achieve a 20% increase in learning engagement and self-efficacy survey scores through peer assessment in collaborative learning groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
